oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Co. C, 1st Regt. Michigan Engineers and Mechanics on top of Lookout Mountain
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Group of soldiers from Co. C, 1st Regt. Mich. Engineers and Mechanics on top of Lookout Mountain. Included in the photo is Sgt. Charles Barclay. An inscription on the back of the image reads, "Miss Esther Vanderbilt from her Uncle Chas. Barclay, Co. C 1st Reg. M. E. & M." There was a photographer's studio near this spot that provided imaging services to a great many Union soldiers after the capture of Lookout Mountain in November 1863.
